New Records: Trey Sweeney had four hits, including a home run, and Ty Madden struck out seven in the Detroit Tigers' 9-1 win over the Oakland Athletics on September 8, 2024
Key Match Events: Trey Sweeney homered to right (404 feet) in the third inning.
Meadows doubled to center, scoring Sweeney and Torkelson in the eighth inning.
Vierling doubled to center, scoring Meadows in the eighth inning.
Greene singled to right, scoring Vierling in the eighth inning.
Carpenter doubled to left, scoring Greene in the eighth inning.
Keith singled to left, scoring Carpenter in the eighth inning.
